name: Tracks (marteena)
description:
Small prototype for a puzzle game about train tracks. Only a couple of levels developed, more to come maybe later. Figure out how to get to next track with the pieces available.

Commands:

click  + Drag  = move.

click + A = scale.

click + S = rotate.

click + left shift = detach.

Maybe I could add a train moving on the tracks. I could for sure add more kind of tracks, but for now I'm moving on to the next idea.

Feedback or suggestions so welcome!
